game.name: Perfect Loop - Soleris
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Perfect Loop – Soleris is a turn-based time-loop RPG: The Entity sends you to Soleris to prevent the world’s downfall. Progress through questlines across multiple runs, level up, and improve your gear to overcome ever greater challenges.
